title: The Future of Shopping and Facebook's Failure
itunes:title: The Future of Shopping and Facebook's Failure
description:
Allan Ellinger, Co-Founder of MMG, discusses how retailers are restructuring in order to survive the pandemic. Amber Atherton, CEO of Zyper, talks about why brands and consumers continue to lose trust in Facebook.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
